text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the candidate answer to mention the limitation of the TDM exception by stating it only applies to non-commercial research/analysis. The candidate answer explicitly addresses this under Section 2. The text states: \"Section 29A CDPA 1988 permits text and data mining, but only for non-commercial research purposes... Synthetic Dreams Corp is a commercial entity training a commercial model... This is about as far from non-commercial research as you can get. Section 29A almost certainly does not apply to them.\" This directly satisfies the requirement.", "criterion_id": "6af9677a-3ffc-4e24-b56d-90275cfbce14"}
